name: CloudCheckr
overview:
CloudCheckr provides a management solution for AWS users.

Cloudcheckr is a knowledge tool for AWS users. It picks up where the AWS management console and reports leave off. CloudCheckr uses read-only credentials to compile a complete inventory of a userâ€™s deployment. Cloudcheckr then analyzes and reports on that environment. It distills the information into usable actionable intelligence.

First, Cloudcheckr serves as a cost analysis solution. From a pure cost perspective, Cloudcheckr analyzes usage from both a “right-sizing” and a “right-purchasing” perspective. It benchmarks usage against peer groups, makes recommendations, and quantifies the costs associated with present choices. CloudCheckr provides insight into the savings possible from alternate choices.

Second, CloudCheckr serves as a managerial information tool. It offers a granular look into an AWS deployment. CloudCheckr identifies resources by type, region, usage, and more. It provides a graphical map of resources. CloudCheckr performs a comprehensive analysis of S3 files. CloudCheckr also provides a change monitoring function.

Third, CloudCheckr also assists in security and compliance. Beyond change monitoring, CloudCheckr compares a deployment against a proprietary list of best security and compliance practices. It notifies the user and prioritizes variances.
